SEARCH
Module application.photos
Package application.photos.controllers

Class ImageGalleryController

java.lang.Object
application.photos.controllers.ImageGalleryController
public class ImageGalleryController extends Object
This class manages all the events fired in the Image Gallery UI and initializes the Gallery with user images.
